data.text:
Andha Yug was the creation of _______.

Muhammad Iqbal

Ahmad Faraz

Dharamvir Bharati

None of the above

Detailed Solution

Download Solution PDF

Andha Yug was the creation of Dharamvir Bharati

Dharamvir Bharati was born in Prayagraj.

Bharati was awarded the Padma Shree for literature.

Some famous work of Dharamvir Bharati:

Gunaho Ka Devta

Suraj ka Satwan Ghoda

Giyara sapno ka desh

Prarambh va Samapan

Kanupriya

Thanda Loha

Saat Geet Varsh

Sapana Abhi Bhi

Toota Pahiya
